description:
A payment plugin for marketplaces and e-commerce site.
HitPay is a one-stop payment platform for SMEs, on a mission to empower businesses with easy access to digital payments.


To discover all the payment options supported by HitPay, click on the following link:
https://www.hitpayapp.com/
name: HitPay
plugin_instructions:
- Setup -

- To use the plugin, you will need to have 
1. A HitPay account (Live Environment)
2. A HitPay sandbox account (Test Environment)
3. API Keys generated from the accounts.


- Documentation -
https://docs.hitpayapp.com/docs/getting-started-1


- Demo -
http://proteus-tech-demo.bubbleapps.io/version-test/hitpay
